ygData.subject: Possible SPOILER [WAS: Warrior wpns and Shields
ygData.msgSnippet: Painbringer is a 1hslash warrior only weapon that has some good stats (cant remember for sure, but something like 9/24) and randomly casts Pain which does 20
ygData.messageBody:
Painbringer is a 1hslash warrior only weapon that has some good stats (cant
remember for sure, but something like 9/24) and randomly casts Pain which
does 20 points of damage to all enemy mobs. The beauty of this weapon is
that you can have two! droooolss...

The Shield of the Fallen Pegasus is a shield that acts as a piercing weapon
when use to bash, stats something like 10/30. Found in Nagafens lair.
